item.title: Democrats battle over who votes first in 2028, a proxy for the party’s future
item.description: Nevada, South Carolina and New Hampshire are among states vying to be first on the 2028 primary calendar.

item.title: Trump bets on rural health as a winning midterm message
item.description: The president is promoting a $50 billion fund, designed to help communities where hospitals are struggling, amid criticism of his deep Medicaid cuts.
